ConfirmApplyMaterial.Title: Confirm applying material
ConfirmApplyMaterial.Content: This will add {value} gp to {material} material of the item and delete the monster part.

Damage.Normal: Strikes with the weapon additionally deal {damage} {damageType} damage.
Damage.Persistent: Strikes with the weapon additionally deal {damage} persistent {damageType} damage.

Imbue.AddCantrip: The weapon can cast {spell} as a cantrip, heightened to half the item's level rounded up.

Magic.Level4: The weapon can cast 1st rank @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.rnNGALRtsjspFTws] once per day.
Magic.Level6: The weapon can cast either 2nd rank @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.f8hRqLJaxBVhF1u0] or 2nd rank @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.rnNGALRtsjspFTws] once per day, but not both.
Magic.Level8: The weapon can cast 2nd rank @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.f8hRqLJaxBVhF1u0] and 3rd rank @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.rnNGALRtsjspFTws] each once per day.
Magic.Level12: The weapon can cast 4th rank @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.f8hRqLJaxBVhF1u0], 3rd rank @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.rnNGALRtsjspFTws], and 5th rank Acid Storm each once per day.
Magic.Level16: The weapon can cast 6th rank @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.f8hRqLJaxBVhF1u0], 3rd rank @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.rnNGALRtsjspFTws], and 7th rank Acid Storm each once per day.
Magic.Level20: The weapon can cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.r4HLQcYwB62bTayl] once per day but you can only choose the acid rain effect. You can choose the acid rain effect twice in a row.

Might.Level8: On a critical hit, the target's armor (if any) takes 3d6 acid damage (before applying Hardness); if the target has a shield raised, the shield takes this damage instead.
Might.Level12: The acid damage dealt by Acid Imbue's Might Path ignores resistances.
Might.Level14: On a critical hit, the target's armor (if any) takes 6d6 acid damage (before applying Hardness); if the target has a shield raised, the shield takes this damage instead.
Might.Level20: On a successful Strike with the weapon, before applying acid damage, the target gains weakness 1 to acid until the beginning of your next turn.

Tech.Level8: On a critical hit, the target's armor (if any) takes 3d6 acid damage (before applying Hardness); if the target has a shield raised, the shield takes this damage instead.
Tech.Level12: The acid damage dealt by Acid Imbue's Technique Path (including the persistent acid damage) ignores resistances.
Tech.Level16: The persistent acid damage from the imbued property eats away at a foe's resistances. Every time a foe or the foe's armor or shield takes damage from the persistent acid damage at the end of their turn, any resistances and Hardness decrease by 1 for 1 minute. This effect is cumulative.
Tech.Level20: On a critical hit, acid eats away at the foe's innards, and they are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 1}.

Bane.Damage: Strikes with the weapon additionally deal {damage} damage of the weapon's base damage type to creatures of type {creature}.
Bane.Persistent: Strikes with the weapon cause external or internal bleeding in creatures of type {creature}. Against such creatures, Strikes with the weapon deal {damage} persistent bleed damage.
Bane.Label: Bane ({creature}, {variant})

Might.Level6: On a critical hit, you sap the strength of a creature of type {creature}, causing it to be @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 1} until the end of your next turn.
Might.Level10: Against a creature of type {creature}, the weapon's base damage ignores the first 5 points of the target's resistance.
Might.Level14: The weapon can outright slay creatures of type {creature}. On a critical hit, a creature of of type {creature} must attempt a Fortitude save. On a critical success, it's @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 1} until the end of your next turn, on a success, it's @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 2} until the end of your next turn, on a failure, it's @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 3} until the end of your next turn, and on a critical failure, it's destroyed. This effect has the incapacitation trait.

Tech.Level6: On a critical hit, you sap the strength of a creature of the bane type, causing it to be @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 1} until the end of your next turn.
Tech.Level10: Against a creature of type {creature}, the weapon's base damage ignores the first 5 points of the target's resistance and the persistent bleed damage from Bane Imbue's Technique Path ignores the target's resistance.
Tech.Level14: The weapon can outright slay creatures of type {creature}. On a critical hit, a creature of of type {creature} is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 2} until the end of your next turn. It must also attempt a Fortitude save. On a failure, it's @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 3} until the end of your next turn, and on a critical failure, it's destroyed. This effect has the incapacitation trait.
Tech.Level20: The weapon can outright slay creatures of type {creature}. On a critical hit, a creature of of type {creature} is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 2}. It must also attempt a Fortitude save. On a failure, it's @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 3}, and on a critical failure, it's destroyed. This effect has the incapacitation trait. The enfeebled condition from a critical hit lasts as long as the persistent bleed damage lasts, or until the end of your next turn, whichever is longer.

Dexterity.Level14: Once per day, you can use a single action activation with manipulate trait to gain a +20-foot status bonus to all your Speeds for 10 minutes. While activated, you gain the effects of @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Seaah9amXg70RKw2]{Water Walk}.

While activated, you gain the effects of both @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Seaah9amXg70RKw2]{Water Walk} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.b5sGjGlBf58f8jn0]{Air Walk}.

Might.Level8: On a critical hit, electricity arcs out to deal an equal amount of electricity damage to up to two other creatures of your choice within 10 feet of the target.
Might.Level12: The electricity damage dealt by Electricity Imbue's Might Path ignores resistances.
Might.Level14: On a critical hit, electricity arcs out to deal an equal amount of electricity damage to up to two other creatures of your choice within 20 feet of the target.

Tech.Level20: Creatures suffering persistent electricity damage from this imbued property become magnetized, attracting metal weapons. Strikes with metal weapons gain a +1 circumstance bonus to hit them as long as they have the persistent electricity damage.

Tech.Level8: On a critical hit, the weapon deals 1d10 additional persistent fire damage. (The additional persistent fire damage on a critical hit is cumulative with the regular persistent fire damage, and as normal you add it in only after doubling the regular persistent fire damage).

Might.Damage: Strikes with the weapon additionally deal {damage} damage. Each time you deal damage, roll 1d6: On a 1, the weapon deals acid damage. On a 2, it deals cold damage. On a 3, it deals electricity damage. On a 4, it deals fire damage. On a 5, it deals negative damage. Finally, on a 6, it deals sonic damage.
Might.Level12: The damage dealt by Wild Imbue's Might Path ignores resistances.
Might.Level20: On a successful Strike with the weapon, before applying the additional damage, the target gains weakness 1 to that damage type until the beginning of your next turn.
